name: CPD
storyline:
Ever since the UAC set up shop in the mountain you've been getting complaints from the nearby towns. They range from excessive nukage seeping into their water supply to unstable nightmares assualting their sleep.

Despite this, the facilities within the mountain kept growing, until one day the whole facility went dark, no contact with the outside world.

As the only soldier close enough to make a difference you hopped into your hover vehicle to investigate, travelling through the mountain ranges until you arrived at one of the many entrances into the maze of facilities.

Before entering you set up your recon drone to go through the many access tunnels in hopes of finding out more whilst you will burst through the main entrance. Your goal is the summit and whatever they found up there...
summary: 32 Maps made in DOOM2 format and intended for limit removing ports. Most maps are small to medium in size and average around 170 monsters. Intended for UV play but other difficulties available.
